1150610.name: City Gangs War in Miami
1150610.description:
Join City Gangs Miami in 30 action well packed missions in his never-ending quest to defeat The BigBoss.
City Gangs Miami is a third person shooter where you have to eliminate all opponents, use grenades, rifles, rocket launchers, tanks, helicopter to defeat the enemy.

FEATURES
- 30 missions
- Controllable vehicles, like cars,tanks, helicopters, air fighters and turrets!
- Multiple weapons
- Extra Explosives
- Achievements
- lots of enemies to defeat
- A shop with awesome ingame features like GodMode, Golden Gun and a Jetpack!!
1150610.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
